Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: 近衛兵
Entry.EnglishText: Imperial Guard

Entry.JapaneseText: スージー
Entry.EnglishText: Susie

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバ
Entry.EnglishText: Zilva

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: ドクター・バース
Entry.EnglishText: Doctor Barrs

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: ナタリー
Entry.EnglishText: Natalie

Entry.JapaneseText: レベッカ
Entry.EnglishText: Rebecca

Entry.JapaneseText: ポーラ
Entry.EnglishText: Paula

Entry.JapaneseText: マヤ
Entry.EnglishText: Maya

Entry.JapaneseText: ファム
Entry.EnglishText: Pham

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア城
Entry.EnglishText: Callegea Castle

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア城
Entry.EnglishText: Callegea Castle

Entry.JapaneseText: 全員整列!!
Entry.EnglishText: Everyone, assemble!

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア女王アガーテ陛下との 謁見の時間である！
Entry.EnglishText: The time has come for Her Majesty, Queen Agarte, to grant an audience with one of you.

Entry.JapaneseText: 本日、陛下に選ばれし 栄誉ある者の名を呼ぶ。 スージー・クエス。一歩前へ！
Entry.EnglishText: Today, I shall name the one whom Her Majesty has graciously chosen. Susie Quess. Step forward!

Entry.JapaneseText: は、はい……
Entry.EnglishText: Y-Yes, sir...

Entry.JapaneseText: こちらは、女王陛下の側近で あらせられるジルバ様だ！ 失礼のなきよう！
Entry.EnglishText: This is the woman serving as Her Majesty's personal aide, Lady Zilva. Give her the utmost respect.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何も心配する事はありません。 女王陛下は、そのご身分ゆえに 同じ年頃の娘たちとお会いになる機会を お持ちでないのです。
Entry.EnglishText: There is nothing you need to worry about. Due to her status, Her Majesty naturally does not often get the opportunity to socialize with young ladies who are close to her in age.

Entry.JapaneseText: ですから、せめてご公務の合間にある わずかな休息のお時間だけでも、 あなたたちとお話をしたり、お茶を 楽しみたいとお考えなのです。
Entry.EnglishText: Therefore, if only for the spare moments between her royal duties, the Queen would like to enjoy pleasant conversation over a cup of tea with you.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうか、アガーテ様の ささやかな願いを叶えて 差し上げてください。
Entry.EnglishText: Please, indulge Queen Agarte in this small request.

Entry.JapaneseText: わかりました……
Entry.EnglishText: I understand...

Entry.JapaneseText: ありがとう。 あなたの優しさに感謝します。
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you. Your kindness is appreciated.

Entry.JapaneseText: 本日、陛下に選ばれし 栄誉ある者の名を呼ぶ。 <Claire>・ベネット。一歩前へ！
Entry.EnglishText: Today, I shall name the one whom Her Majesty has graciously chosen. <Claire> Bennett. Step forward!

Entry.JapaneseText: は、はい……
Entry.EnglishText: Y-Yes, sir...

Entry.JapaneseText: そんなに硬くならなくても大丈夫。 女王陛下と、ご歓談のひと時を 過ごしてもらえれば、それでいいのです。
Entry.EnglishText: There is no need to be so tense. All that is required of you is to enjoy a pleasant conversation with Her Majesty the Queen.

Entry.JapaneseText: はい。
Entry.EnglishText: All right...

Entry.JapaneseText: さあ、ついていらっしゃい。
Entry.EnglishText: Now then, please follow me.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あとは頼んだぞ…… アガーテ様を……<Annie>を……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm counting on you... Take care of Lady Agarte...and my <Annie>...
Entry.Notes: unsure whether lady or queen agarte

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ダメだ!! 死ぬな!! がんばれ!! 目を開けるんだ!! バース!! ……バース!!
Entry.EnglishText: No! Don't you dare die on me! Hang in there! Open your eyes, Barrs! Barrs!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Eugene>……すまない……
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>... I'm sorry...

Entry.JapaneseText: バース、しっかりしろ!! バース!!
Entry.EnglishText: Barrs, hang in there!! Barrs!!

Entry.JapaneseText: お父さん……!?
Entry.EnglishText: Father...?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ああ…… うおおおおおおおおおォォォッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Urgh... Aaaaaaaaagh!!

Entry.JapaneseText: お父さん…… お父さぁぁぁぁぁん!!
Entry.EnglishText: Father..! FATHER!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ダメです…… さっきまでうわごとのように 隊長の名を呼んでいましたが、 もう呼吸も……
Entry.EnglishText: He's a lost cause... Even though he was mumbling the Commander's name just a moment ago, he's stopped breathing...

Entry.JapaneseText: お父さん!! お父さん!!
Entry.EnglishText: Father! Father!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>・ガラルド。 ドクターを刺したのは、 あなたですね？
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene> Gallardo. You were the one who stabbed Doctor Barrs, weren't you?

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺だ……俺がバースを…… バースを殺したのは……俺だ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, it was me... I did it... I killed Barrs!

Entry.JapaneseText: 隊長の身柄を拘束せよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Take the commander into custody.

Entry.JapaneseText: なぜだ……なぜなんだ!! おぉ……うおおおおおおおおおッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Why... Damnit, why?! Uurgh... Uuuuaaaaagh!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あらたまって話とは何だ？
Entry.EnglishText: ...What did you need to discuss with me?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……先王陛下はずいぶん長い間、 病床に伏されていた。
Entry.EnglishText: ...His Majesty was bedridden for quite some time before his passing.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ。 それにもかかわらず無茶をされて…… あんな事をなさらなければ、 いまだご存命であられたはず。
Entry.EnglishText: He was. Yet in spite of that, he still did something so reckless... Had he not, perhaps he would still be with us.

Entry.JapaneseText: いや…… 陛下は自らの死期を 悟られていた……
Entry.EnglishText: No, His Majesty had sensed that his death was imminent.

Entry.JapaneseText: どういう事だ？
Entry.EnglishText: What do you mean?

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえは陛下の病を 未知のものだと言ったが、 それだけでは説明できない 不審な点がいくつもある。
Entry.EnglishText: You claimed that you could not diagnose his illness, but there are several other things that aren't adding up.

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえは……私が 嘘の診断をしたというのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you trying to imply that I had misdiagnosed His Majesty?

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺は……おまえを信じたい。 だからこそ、おまえに直接 尋ねているんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: I want to believe in you. Which is why I wanted to ask you directly.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は……私は…… ラドラス陛下を お救いしたかった!!
Entry.EnglishText: I... I... I wanted to save His Majesty!!

Entry.JapaneseText: だが……できなかった…… 陛下は……
Entry.EnglishText: But I couldn't... His Majesty was...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……陛下は邪魔だったんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: ...In the way...

Entry.JapaneseText: バース……!!
Entry.EnglishText: Barrs...!!

Entry.JapaneseText: 死ね!!
Entry.EnglishText: Die!!

Entry.JapaneseText: うおっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Guh!!

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえの想像どおりさ。 私が陛下に毒を盛ったんだよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: It's just as you suspected. I had poisoned His Majesty!

Entry.JapaneseText: バース、やはりおまえが……
Entry.EnglishText: Barrs... So it was you, after all!

Entry.JapaneseText: 「やはり」ではなく「まさか」だろう？ 親友じゃないのか、私たちは!!
Entry.EnglishText: "After all?" Did you not mean to say "I can't believe this?" Am I not your closest friend!?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ぐあっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Ggh!!

Entry.JapaneseText: チィッ、外したか。
Entry.EnglishText: Tch, I missed.

Entry.JapaneseText: 鋭い洞察力と非情なまでの冷静さ。 それに、この戦闘能力…… シャクだね……シャクだが、 陛下がおまえを重宝したワケだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Your intuition is sharp and your composure is impenetrable. Not to mention your combat prowess... What an inconvenience... Though I guess that's why His Majesty valued you so highly.

Entry.JapaneseText: バース……!!
Entry.EnglishText: Barrs...!!

Entry.JapaneseText: 殺すには惜しい男だ…… だが、生かしておくには…… 危険すぎる!!
Entry.EnglishText: Killing a man like you feels like such a waste, but...you're too dangerous to be left alive!

Entry.JapaneseText: 死ね!!
Entry.EnglishText: Die!!

Entry.JapaneseText: よせ、バース!! やめろ!!
Entry.EnglishText: No, Barrs! Stop!!

Entry.JapaneseText: うぅ…… うわぁぁぁぁぁぁぁぁッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Uugh... Uaaagh!!

Entry.JapaneseText: バースッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Barrs!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……私は……私は一体……
Entry.EnglishText: I... What have I...?

Entry.JapaneseText: バース、なぜだ…… どうして、こんな事に……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Why Barrs? Why would you do such a thing?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……そ、そうか…… 私がラドラス陛下を…… そうなんだな？
Entry.EnglishText: Ah yes... I killed King Ladras, didn't I...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 違う……何かの間違いだ…… 違うんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: No, something isn't right here... That can't be what happened...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私はもうダメだ…… だから……あとは頼んだぞ…… アガーテ様を……<Annie>を……
Entry.EnglishText: It seems like this is the end for me... I'm counting on you... Take care of Lady Agarte... and my <Annie>...
Entry.Notes: unsure whether lady or queen agarte

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ダメだ!! 死ぬな!! がんばれ!! 目を開けるんだ!! バース!!……バース!!
Entry.EnglishText: No! Don't you dare die on me! Hang in there! Open your eyes, Barrs! Barrs!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Eugene>……すまない……
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>... I'm sorry...

Entry.JapaneseText: バース、死ぬな……！ バースッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Barrs, don't die on me! Barrs!!

Entry.JapaneseText: だ、誰か、誰か来てくれ!!
Entry.EnglishText: S-Somebody, somebody come quick!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ああ…… うおおおおおおおおおォォォッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Urgh... Aaaaaaaaagh!!

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたも最近、 連れてこられたの？
Entry.EnglishText: Were you brought in here recently as well?

Entry.JapaneseText: いいえ、もうかなり前になるわ。
Entry.EnglishText: No, it's been quite a while.

Entry.JapaneseText: もともと別の部屋にいたんだけど、 いっぱいになったから こっちの部屋に移されてきたの。
Entry.EnglishText: I was originally in another room, but they moved me to this room because it was full.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私たちの他にも、 多くの女の子たちがお城に 連れて来られているわ。
Entry.EnglishText: There are many other girls being brought to the castle besides us.

Entry.JapaneseText: こんなに大勢の子が 集められてるのは どうしてなのかしら……？
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder why so many girls are gathered here to begin with...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王様の側近のジルバ様は、 心配はいらないとおっしゃるけど……
Entry.EnglishText: The queen's aide, Zilva, says there's nothing to worry about.

Entry.JapaneseText: こうしてさらわれてきて 心配ないって言われても 信用できないわ……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't trust them when they say there's nothing to worry about after being kidnapped like this.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうね……
Entry.EnglishText: Right...

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王様もガジュマだし、 ジルバ様もガジュマ……
Entry.EnglishText: The Queen is a Gajuma, and so is Zilva...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマと私たちヒューマって 相容れない存在なのかも しれないわね。
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe Gajuma and us Huma are simply incompatible with one another.

Entry.JapaneseText: それにしても 女王様のお眼鏡にかなった お方は幸運でしょうね。
Entry.EnglishText: At any rate, the lucky man with whom the Queen is infatuated has to be a very fortunate individual indeed.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんてったって、 女王様の旦那様になるんですもの。
Entry.EnglishText: After all... They're going to be the Queen's husband.

Entry.JapaneseText: わたしは、この生活が嫌じゃないわ。 王城なんて、普通に暮らしていたら 入る事なんてできないし。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't mind this lifestyle one bit. Besides, if I lived a normal life, I wouldn't ever be able to enter the royal castle.

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたは怖くないの？
Entry.EnglishText: You're not scared?

Entry.JapaneseText: 多少は不安だけど…… でも、女王様とお話するの 楽しいし。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm a little nervous at times... But it's fun to talk to the Queen.

Entry.JapaneseText: これは、私のカンだけど、 女王様は恋をなさってるわ。
Entry.EnglishText: This is just a hunch of mine, but I think the queen is in love.

Entry.JapaneseText: 恋？ どうして そんな風に思うの？
Entry.EnglishText: Love? Why do you think that?

Entry.JapaneseText: 私が恋人の話をしたら、とても熱心に お聞きで、色々お尋ねになったもの。 私の恋の話に興味を持たれたみたい。
Entry.EnglishText: When I talked about my boyfriend, she was very intensely engaged and asked me many questions. I think she was interested in my love story.

Entry.JapaneseText: それから何度か呼ばれて、 お話ししたわ。
Entry.EnglishText: I was called to the chambers plenty of times, and we ended up having long chats.

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王様はどんな事を お尋ねになったの？
Entry.EnglishText: What did the queen ask you about?

Entry.JapaneseText: 男性は女性の どんなところを見るのかって。
Entry.EnglishText: What men look for in women.

Entry.JapaneseText: だから「男性はみんな、美しい女性が 好きなんですよ」ってお答えしたの。
Entry.EnglishText: So I replied, "All men like beautiful women."

Entry.JapaneseText: そう言ったら、 少し怖い顔になって…… 戻るように言われたわ。
Entry.EnglishText: When I said that, she looked a little distressed... And then told me to go back.

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王様とお会いした時、 どんな感じだったの？
Entry.EnglishText: When you met with the Queen, what was she like?

Entry.JapaneseText: それが私、気を失っていたみたいなの。 気がついた時には、 女王様はいなくなっていたわ。
Entry.EnglishText: I think I blacked out. By the time I came to, the Queen was gone.

Entry.JapaneseText: どういう事なのかしら……
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder what happened...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私も女王様の部屋に 呼ばれるのかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you think I'll also be called to the Queen's chambers?

Entry.JapaneseText: 呼ばれていった人の話を 聞いたら、怖くて怖くて……
Entry.EnglishText: When I heard what happened to the people who were called, I was so scared.

Entry.JapaneseText: 大丈夫よ、ファム。 元気を出して。
Entry.EnglishText: It'll be okay, Pham. Keep your head up.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『カレギア王家陳列ケース』 キョグエンから贈られた 「コウロ」という道具が入っている。 この中から香り付きの煙を出して 害虫を退治するそうだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Callegean Royal Family's Display Case - On display is a device called a <Italic>Kouro</Italic> that was gifted by the town of Kyogen. It is said that the scented smoke that comes from the inside will ward off pests.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『カレギア王家陳列ケース』 キョグエンからから贈られた 「キセル」「ネツケ」が並べてある。 「ネツケ」は 紳士のおしゃれに欠かせない アクセサリー。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Callegean Royal Family's Display Case - A <Italic>Kiseru</Italic> and <Italic>Netsuke</Italic> that were gifted by the town of Kyogen are on display. The <Italic>Netsuke</Italic> is an essential accessory for any gentleman.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『カレギア王家陳列ケース』 各地から贈られた珍しい品々を 並べてある。 中でも「キョグエン扇子」は 戦闘時に敵に投げつけるという 恐るべき武器。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Callegean Royal Family's Display Case - There are rare items donated from all over the world on display. Among them is a Kyogen Fan, a fearsome weapon that is thrown at enemies during battle.
